de.axnsoftware.settings.impl.accessor

Class AbstractPropertyAccessorImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.axnsoftware.settings.impl.accessor.AbstractAccessorImpl
      • de.axnsoftware.settings.impl.accessor.AbstractPropertyAccessorImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAccessor, IPropertyAccessor, Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractContainerItemAccessorImpl, AbstractContainerPropertyAccessorImpl, BranchPropertyAccessorImpl, LeafPropertyAccessorImpl

    public abstract class AbstractPropertyAccessorImpl
extends AbstractAccessorImpl
implements IPropertyAccessor
    The abstract class AbstractPropertyAccessorImpl models the root of a hierarchy of derived implementation classes and it provides the default behaviour for all implementations of the IPropertyAccessor interface.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Carsten Klein "cklein"
